title: Smurfing and boosting
body:
So sick of the smurfs and boosters. How does a high ranked player (plat+) get an account that is only low bronze without deliberately throwing games or buying the account?

Most ranked games seem to have a smurf/booster in them for the last couple of weeks. Sick of it. trying to build my rank and so many game wrecked because of these smurfs and outrightly cheating boosters. Wish RIOT would actually do something about it.

replies.body:
Smurfing in low-elo needs to stop. 

**OCE is small, and smurfing affects us all. Low, Mid and High ELO!**

If you want OCE to grow, smurfing under mid silver needs to stop! 100%. This will allow new players to slot into their ELO nicely and grow at their own pace. 
Some new players will be better than others, and they will climb and devlop with a steady and smooth curve.

this bronze stomping needs to stop, its limiting our server growth and just straight up a dick move.


I know each ELO has this issue

Gold players camp bronze, silver. 
Plat players camp gold, silver and bronze.
Diamond players camp Plat.
Challenger players camp Plat and diamond.

Its not fun for anyone at any elo.

despite what people think, a lot of smurfs are actually using their accounts to learn a new role or a new champ. They may not feel comfortable playing in their own elo, and need to practice a bit lower. If they are playing a completely different role or adopting a new play style (e.g from ranged to melee), they will be placed lower than you would expect. I recently did placements as an ADC and got placed in B3. Overall smurf macro play is better, so even if playing an off role it can be pretty obvious that they're playing below their level. 

As for boosters, they suck. If you see someone in a game that you suspect to be boosting an account (really common with end of season fast approaching), please report them in the end of game screen - leaving a comment in the box saying that you think they are boosting. Riot will look into it and quite a few of them will be banned :3
C'mon, how does a platinum 2 player have a smurf that gets placed in bronze 3, get real here.
Im sure when I get my jg account to level 30 and do placements I will be forever B5 lmao.

!!!

Actually I'm keen to see what you do to climb from bronze 3. I'm in bronze 2 atm and teams are pretty bad most of the past 3 weeks.

Smurfs are fine as long as they don't intentionally feed/troll in them (i have a smurf that is silver 3, started at silver 5 after provisionals.)

Boosters are an issue, and an issue that gets worse close to the end of the season (desperate people who want better rewards before the end of the season) but riot doesn't actively push to combat it hard enough to actually stop boosting.

Not to mention this season is worse because of Dynamic Queue

Boosting is aids but what can you do man, im guilty for having a smurf, But im not exactly the highest challenger smurf god tier kinda guy, My main is Gold III and smurf is Silver IV still unfair advantage but still in Terms of Use so im all G :) 

I Still understand your frustration VS'd a Yasuo on my smurf who was so good, Check match history he had line 0-12 stats and when he played he had like a 20-5 KD (Clearly Boosted but it happens man :/ )

Hay can you send me your twitch link?
And are you still up for streaming the silly touney?
Been trying to get a hold of you for dayz
message me in game sorry man been playing BF 1 :3 probs play it while you're streaming <3

I mean it is very frustrating and I used to be like this too but you can't really do much about it. The fact that you want to build you rank and that you're versing high elo players (boosters/smurfs) is almost good in the long run. It gives you opportunity to learn from them and better yourself against higher elo players.
That's why you don't play at the end of the season
A lot of them have friends who play so instead of inting their way to bronze, they just take their friends account.
